channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Apple Music for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Apple Music for Android

item.title: CVE-2023-28203|2023-07-28T04:30:44.274Z -- apple -- apple%20music%20for%20android
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in Apple Music 4.2.0 for Android. An app may be able to access contacts.

item.title: CVE-2023-32427|2023-07-28T04:30:39.602Z -- apple -- apple%20music%20for%20android
item.description: This issue was addressed by using HTTPS when sending information over the network. This issue is fixed in Apple Music 4.2.0 for Android. An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to intercept network traffic.
